page.title: 11The Carnival
page.content: Every year at the end of July, Bakewell Carnival takes place. It lasts for one week, and many different events take place, something every evening. Thursday must be the highlight of the week, because on that evening the {raft race }takes place. Anyone can take part and there are prizes for the best decorated rafts as well as the fastest rafts. The rafts have to travel about 1km along the{ River Wye from Wynn's Meadow to the Park. There must be two people on each raft. Last year two competitors made a model of {Noddy's car,}complete with a radio! The raft race is followed by the {Jack Russell Races. }Fluffy toy hares are pulled along on string, and are chased by the dogs. Some dogs don't bother to run, and this causes great amusement for the spectators.
